statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ApiName , AA.ApiType , AA.ApiModel , AA.RequestDate , AA.Status , AA.SendData , AA.ReceiveData
FROM IKScrap.dbo.TApiRequest AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ApiName = #ApiName#
AND AA.ApiType = #ApiType#
AND AA.ApiModel = #ApiModel#
AND AA.RequestDate > DATEADD(DAY, -1, #StartRequestDate#)
AND AA.RequestDate < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #EndRequestDate#)
AND ( AA.SendData LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' OR AA.ReceiveData LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM IKScrap.dbo.TApiRequest AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TApiRequest ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ApiName, ApiType, ApiModel, RequestDate, Status, SendData, ReceiveData ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ApiName#, #ApiType#, #ApiModel#, #RequestDate#, #Status#, #SendData#, #ReceiveData# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKScrap.dbo.TApiRequest SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ApiName = #ApiName# , ApiType = #ApiType# , ApiModel = #ApiModel# , RequestDate = #RequestDate# , Status = #Status# , SendData = #SendData# , ReceiveData = #ReceiveData# WHERE ID = #ID#
